pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Saturday, February 8, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Addis Ababa, Ethiopia  

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the African Union high level breakfast meeting on gender equality and women’s empowerment in Africa.

Lalibela Grand Ballroom 1-2, Lower Level
Sheraton Addis Hotel

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed.

White Salon, 1st floor
Office of the Prime Minister

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Unity Park with the Prime Minister of Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed.

Closed to media.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Ethiopia, Sahle-Work Zewde.

Red Salon, Ground Floor
Jubilee Palace

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a working luncheon with the President of Ethiopia, Sahle-Work Zewde.

Small Dining Room, 1st Floor
Jubilee Palace

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity  

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make a joint statement to media with the President of Ethiopia, Sahle-Work Zewde.

Foyer, Ground Floor
Jubilee Palace  

Note for media:

  • Open coverage  

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Official Dinner given by the Prime Minister of Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed.

Throne Hall, Ground Floor
Menelik Palace

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only

7:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the African Union high level panel discussion on Africa’s Blue Economy.

Lalibela Grand Ballroom 1-2, Lower Level
Sheraton Addis Hotel

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
